title: Tata Motors total domestic sales down 15 pc at 69,694 units in Sep
description: Tata Motors Ltd reported a 15 percent drop in total domestic sales for September compared to the previous year. Passenger vehicle sales fell by 8 percent, while commercial vehicle sales declined by 23 percent. The decrease in sales is attributed to slow consumer demand and seasonal factors affecting the auto industry.
